mapper.select: SELECT J.JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO ,J.DESCRIPTION AS JOURNAL_DESCRIPTION ,A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE ,A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME ,A.DESCRIPTION AS ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DESCRIPTION ,C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM JOURNAL_DETAIL J ,ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DETAIL A ,CODE_DETAIL C WHERE JOURNAL_NO = #{journalNo} AND J.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE AND J.DESCRIPTION = C.DETAIL_CODE(+)
SELECT #{slipNo} || 'JOURNAL' || " NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(JOURNAL_NO), INSTR(MAX(JOURNAL_NO), 'JOURNAL') + 7) + 1, 0) FROM JOURNAL WHERE SLIP_NO = #{slipNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOURNAL_DETAIL ( SELECT J.JOURNAL_NO, JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, ACC.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE, NULL FROM JOURNAL J, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE ACC, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DETAIL ACD WHERE J.JOURNAL_NO = #{journalNo} AND J.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = ACC.ACCOUNT_CODE AND ACC.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE = ACD.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE)
